prompt: What is your opinion on remote work? Do you think it is more productive than working in an office? Why or why not?
strongResponse: In my opinion, remote work offers significant advantages in terms of productivity and flexibility. Firstly, the lack of a commute allows for better time management. Overall, I believe a hybrid model is often the most productive approach.

feedbackTemplates.mid: Good points made. Your response had some structure, though it could be more cohesive.
feedbackTemplates.high: Very well-structured opinion. You used logical connectors and supported your points effectively.
